entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wrigley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 39. POP 30%
